column1: Uchi////Uchi is incredible. I don't think they make a bad dish.  The omakase is one of the best meals I have ever had in my life. My husband and I went to celebrate his birthday and got the omakase and whatever was the best from the social hour menu. Pro tip
column3: as you will get happy hour prices on what they bring you for that menu.   I didn't want to stop eating.  The service is impeccable and the food is to die for. This is the best splurge meal in Houston.
